panels.description: Total number of requests from Airlock Microgateway to application upstreams.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Percentage of 4xx and 5xx upstream requests.

targets.expr:
sum (increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`, envoy_response_code=~"[45].."}[$__range]))/
sum (increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[$__range]))

panels.title: Request Error Rate

panels.description: Number of requests with a 1xx response code from application upstreams.

targets.expr: sum (increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`, envoy_response_code=~"1.."}[$__range]) or on () vector(0))

panels.title: 1xx Requests

panels.title: 2xx Requests

panels.description: Number of requests with a 4xx response code from application upstreams.
panels.title: 4xx Requests

panels.description: Number of requests with a 5xx response code from application upstreams.
panels.title: 5xx Requests

panels.description: Total requests per second to upstream applications.

targets.expr:
sum (rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`, envoy_response_code=~"[45].."}[$__rate_interval]))/
sum (rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`}[1m]))

panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Percentiles of the application upstream latency over one minute.
panels.title: Request duration

panels.description: Requests per second to upstream applications by their actual response code (1xx).

targets.expr: sum  by (envoy_response_code) (rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{managed_by=~"${operator:regex}", namespace=~"${namespace:regex}", gateway_kind=~"${gateway_kind:regex}", gateway=~"${gateway_name:regex}", envoy_cluster_name=~`(^upstream_.+|^httproute/.+)`,upstream=~`(${gateway_httproute:regex}|${sidecar_application_port:regex})`, envoy_response_code=~"1.."}[1m]))

list.description: Allows filtering on the gateway kind.
list.label: Gateway Kind
list.name: gateway_kind

list.description: Allows filtering on the managing operator instance.
list.label: Microgateway Operator
list.name: operator

list.description: Allows filtering on the namespaces in which gateways are deployed.
list.label: Gateway Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: Allows filtering on specific gateway instance names within the selected namespaces.
list.label: Gateway Name
list.name: gateway_name

list.description: Allows filtering request metrics of the selected SidecarGateway instances on application container port. This filter is ignored for other gateway kinds.
list.label: Sidecar Application Port
list.name: sidecar_application_port

list.description: Allows filtering request metrics of the selected Gateway instances on the name of their matching HTTPRoute. This filter is ignored for other gateway kinds.
list.label: Gateway HTTPRoute
list.name: gateway_httproute
